items.name: Unified Accounts
items.desc: One account works everywhere. Sign in once and access any game or operating system that integrates with Rotur, creating a seamless cross-platform experience.

items.name: Universal Avatars
items.desc: Access user profile images through our simple avatars.rotur.dev service. Just append any username to instantly retrieve their 256Ã—256 JPEG profile picture for seamless UI integration.

items.name: Rotur Economy
items.desc: Our integrated currency allows users to transfer credits, aquire daily credits, and purchase items on the Rotur marketplace. Everything is handled on-server, with simples APIs to make implementing these features a breeze.

items.name: Achievement System
items.desc: Collect and display badges on your profile to showcase your accomplishments across the Rotur ecosystem.

items.name: Social Connections
items.desc: Connect with friends across the Rotur ecosystem. Send and manage friend requests, see who's online, and interact with your network across all integrated platforms.

items.name: Claw Social Platform
items.desc: A Twitter-like social media platform built on Rotur. Claw features a simple, algorithm-free single feed that's perfect for adding social functionality to your Rotur client operating systems.

items.name: RMail Messaging
items.desc: Send and receive messages to any Rotur user through our built-in mail system. Communications persist across sessions and platforms for true connectivity.

items.name: Voice Communication
items.desc: Make real-time voice calls between Rotur users on any platform. Developed in collaboration with CL5 and MikeDev, this feature enables seamless voice interaction.

items.name: Advanced Networking
items.desc: Built on an enhanced version of cloudlink, Rotur's networking layer transmits rich user data and context with each packet, enabling more sophisticated application interactions.

items.name: Cloud Storage
items.desc: Store key-value pairs securely in the cloud. Perfect for game saves, user preferences, documents, and any data you want accessible across multiple devices and platforms.

items.name: Real-time Data Sync
items.desc: Synchronize variables between peers with minimal latency. Build collaborative applications and multiplayer experiences with our advanced variable sync system.

items.name: Authentication
items.desc: Versitile and easy-to-use authentication systems make logging in and verifying accounts straightforward.
